entry.data:
MOSTLY SUNNY
COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE MID 30S THIS AFTERNOON
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

CLEAR
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 19
NORTH WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH, BECOMING NORTHWEST 5 TO 10 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH, BECOMING WEST IN THE AFTERNOON

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 20S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE MID 40S
WEST WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 20S

PARTLY CLOUDY
COLD WITH LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE

entry.em: SUNDAY NIGHT AND MARTIN LUTHER KING JR DAY
entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS 15 TO 20
HIGHS AROUND 30

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS AROUND 10 ABOVE
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 30S
